title: Lawmakers Grill TikTok Executive About Ties to China
description: TikTok’s chief operating officer, Vanessa Pappas, faced questions about whether the company would ever hand over user data to Chinese officials.

title: California Files Antitrust Lawsuit Against Amazon
description: Rob Bonta, California’s attorney general, said the retailer punishes companies that offer lower prices on other websites.

title: E.U. Scores Major Legal Victory Against Google
description: A court rejected Google’s appeal of a record-setting antitrust fine related to Android and online search.

title: How a Spreader of Voter Fraud Conspiracy Theories Became a Star
description: For more than a decade, Catherine Engelbrecht, a Texas mom turned election-fraud crusader, has sown doubts about ballots and voting. Her patience has paid off.

title: Text Messaging Is Cool. But Where Are Its Boundaries?
description: Apple and Google have added useful features to texting apps, yet the apps still lack a major component: an effective way to set limits.
